SE Process Tailoring Framework

Interactive tool for tailoring Systems Engineering processes based on ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288:2023

Welcome to Your Process Tailoring Journey

This framework helps you determine the optimal level of formality for each systems engineering process based on your project's specific characteristics, complexity, safety requirements, and organizational maturity.

Multi-Criteria Assessment

Evaluate project complexity, safety criticality, scale, and organizational maturity

Interactive Visualization

Explore process interdependencies and tailoring recommendations

Smart Recommendations

Get tailored process levels with detailed rationale and dependencies

Professional Reports

Export comprehensive reports in PDF, JSON, and Excel formats
